thread.title: Diesel collapse gives automakers carbon headache

title: Diesel collapse gives automakers carbon headache
text:
Diesel collapse gives automakers carbon headache 9:56am EST - 01:44 
The accelerating demise of diesel, long used by carmakers to boost fuel efficiency, is undermining their plans to meet looming European Union CO2 goals, and avoid big annual fines. As Sonia legg reports, executives at the Geneva auto show are grappling with some unpalatable choices.
